ing: 1 (8 ounce) can whole berry cranberry sauce
des: "Cranberries and spices and fruit, what more is there? This is a wonderful side dish on any occasion. Serve chilled in chutney jar."
ins:
Mix pineapple, mandarin oranges, cranberry sauce, cinnamon, brown sugar, and vanilla extract together in a bowl.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 4 hours.
